title: The 2015 Rookie Class Was the Best in 100 Years FanGraphs Baseball

type_specific.selection: Toward the end of July, something had become apparent in the 2015 season: it was an unquestionably great year for talented positional rookies. That was easy to see by the first half introduction of All-Star caliber players in Kris Bryant, Carlos Correa, and Joc Pederson. Many others added to the top-heavy, strong class. As it […]
